name: Effective Teamwork
description: Learn to collaborate effectively and contribute to high-performing teams.

levels.title: Being a Team Player
levels.objective: Understand roles, responsibilities, and the value of cooperation.
levels.description: Focus on reliability, supporting colleagues, and common courtesy within a team structure.
practices: Offer help to a teammate before they ask
Deliver on all promised tasks on time

levels.title: Collaborative Problem Solving
levels.objective: Work with others to solve complex problems collectively.
levels.description: Learn brainstorming techniques, consensus building, and how to value diverse perspectives.
practices: Practice building on others' ideas ('Yes, and...')
Seek input from quieter team members

levels.title: Navigating Conflict
levels.description: Learn to address disagreements openly and respectfully, focusing on solutions rather than blame.
practices: Address a minor friction point directly but kindly
Meditate a disagreement between two peers (if appropriate)
Reflect on your own role in past conflicts

resources.title: The Five Dysfunctions of a Team
